comments.content: I love it i hoped i could get it for free.
I'm not convinced the large sample Zev posted is the same face as Badger's first sample. In the large sample, the s has a different curve and is narrower, as is the n.

\Here's a sample of [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224240/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din/light/testdrive.html?s=Postyno&p=72), it's awfully close if not exact. And it is not free. And very popular...   
   
http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38638.html?1087592600
